home.subtitle: Discover the best Vietnamese drum DJ music

rulesPage.title: Platform Rules and Terms
rulesPage.subtitle: Please read the following rules and terms carefully to maintain platform order and protect user rights
rulesPage.section1Item1: BeatMM Pro is a music sharing and DJ community platform for Myanmar users, for legal and peaceful use only.
rulesPage.section1Item2: Users must upload original content or authorized content. Plagiarism of others' music, covers, or descriptions is prohibited.
rulesPage.section1Item3: All tipping is voluntary and non-refundable. The platform provides technical services and deducts service fees.
rulesPage.section1Item4: Registering on the platform means agreeing to follow the rules. Violations may result in content removal or account bans.
rulesPage.section1Item5: Uploading or posting illegal, pornographic, violent, hateful, or politically sensitive content is prohibited.
rulesPage.section1Item6: Private messaging is forbidden; only system customer service interactions are allowed for security and compliance.
rulesPage.section1Item7: Withdrawal requires real payment information. If withdrawal account doesn't match registered identity, the platform may refuse.
rulesPage.section1Item8: BeatMM Pro reserves the right of final interpretation and may amend terms to comply with local laws or operations.
rulesPage.section2Item1: Users can recharge accounts via KPay, KBZ Banking, etc., to tip favored DJs.
rulesPage.section2Item2: Tipping amounts are freely chosen and cannot be revoked or refunded once confirmed.
rulesPage.section2Item3: Tipping income goes to DJs after 10% technical service fee deduction.
rulesPage.section2Item4: DJs can request withdrawals after 3,000 MMK balance. Withdrawals are paid via KPay/KBZ Banking.
rulesPage.section2Item5: Withdrawal requests are manually reviewed within 24 hours; real payment QR codes must be uploaded.
rulesPage.section2Item6: Withdrawal accounts must match the DJ's registered phone number; fake or third-party accounts are banned.
rulesPage.section2Item7: Fake tipping, screenshot forging, or false transactions lead to immediate bans and balance freezes.
rulesPage.section3Item1: Any BeatMM user can apply to become a DJ by submitting personal info and music works.
rulesPage.section3Item2: Applications require stage name, avatar, and at least one original music work.
rulesPage.section3Item3: Platform reviews applications within 1â€“2 business days, focusing on originality, quality, and compliance.
rulesPage.section3Item5: Violation uploads will revoke certification and ban DJs permanently.
rulesPage.section3Item6: DJs are responsible for their content; platform disclaims all infringement liability.
rulesPage.section3Item7: Encourage original Vietnamese drum, Myanmar style, and local music creation.
rulesPage.importantReminderText1: Using this platform means you have read, understood, and agreed to all rules and terms.
rulesPage.importantReminderText2: The platform is committed to a safe and compliant music sharing environment and community.
rulesPage.importantReminderText3: For questions, contact support or check the help documentation.
